name: Crimsonworld HD
description:
One hero. Tons of monsters. And weapons. A LOT OF WEAPONS.

Are you ready for pure, non-stop action without any other stupid stuff?
This is CRIMSONWORLD HD. Doom-style bloody mess, with a top-down view.

✭ FEATURES ✭

✔ Perks system
✔ 25 unique locations
✔ 12 types of futuristic weapon
✔ Tons of deadly monsters
✔ Quest, Rush and Survival modes
✔ Stunning pre-rendered graphics
✔ AI Mode for the begginers
✔ Demo Mode to impress your friends

For Demo Mode, just wait a few seconds on the main menu screen.
